column4: when you run in failsafe mode, that's more or less equivilant to windows safe mode with networking correct?

no because  it loads my radio server and it takes over the audio with a different source so i cant access the audio like it normally would work so i have a work around by loading failsafe and then it doesnt load the radio station stuff and i can hear audio see?
then disable the radio stuff on boot, and load it when needed :)
